locations.name: Banff
locations.description: The primary hub within Banff National Park, mentioned for strolling through the town and as a likely base for exploring the Rockies, Lake Louise, and potentially the Icefields Parkway.

locations.name: Victoria
locations.description: The capital of British Columbia on Vancouver Island, explicitly mentioned as the starting point on the island, known for its Inner Harbour and architecture.

locations.name: Tofino
locations.description: A coastal town on the west coast of Vancouver Island, described as a destination reached after Victoria, known for beaches, rainforests, surfing, and access to Clayoquot Sound.
